## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [close()](./temit.temitclient.close.md) |  | Closes this instance's AMQP connection if it's active.<!-- -->Currently this is always a cold close and will interrupt consumers and publishers. |
|  [connect()](./temit.temitclient.connect.md) |  | Connect to the AMQP node given when this instance was instantiated. |
|  [emitter(event, opts)](./temit.temitclient.emitter.md) |  | Creates an emitter that can be used to push data to listeners. |
|  [endpoint(event, handler)](./temit.temitclient.endpoint.md) |  | Creates an endpoint that can be used to respond to requesters. |
|  [endpoint(event, opts, handler)](./temit.temitclient.endpoint_1.md) |  |  |
|  [isConnected()](./temit.temitclient.isconnected.md) |  | Returns whether or not this Temit instance is connected to an AMQP node. |
|  [listener(event, handler)](./temit.temitclient.listener.md) |  | Creates a listener that can be used to receive data from emitters. |
|  [listener(event, opts, handler)](./temit.temitclient.listener_1.md) |  |  |
|  [requester(event, opts)](./temit.temitclient.requester.md) |  | Creates a requester that can be used to request data from endpoints. |
